Name: Gin & Juice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Review: Gin and fruit juice. OK, but nothing to sing about.
History: Possibly the inspiration behind the Top 10 single 'Gin and Juice' by rapper Snoop Doggy Dogg, from his debut album 'Doggystyle'.
Nutrition: One serving of Gin & Juice contains 184 calories
